rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0001
rows.name: Those guys, restlessly running around, damn them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0002
rows.name: Damn it! Maybe I should just burn this whole area to the ground![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0003
rows.name: Riiz, weren't we supposed to burn their city?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0005
rows.name:
I can't stand being looked down on
by guys like that, yo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0006
rows.name:
But we can't fight effectively like this.
It'd be better if the Zu Pharg changed form to fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0007
rows.name:
I was just about to do that!
Don't you order me around, yo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0008
rows.name: Crap! Against such trash... Damn it!![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0010
rows.name: Such a massive machine to transform even while flying...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0011
rows.name:
In other words, the Growth have succeeded
in achieving flight through gravity control.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0014
rows.name:
Because Doll flight packs use
lift for flight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0015
rows.name:
Technologically, they're way ahead of us.
It's frustrating.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0016
rows.name:
Development is progressing on equipping
Dolls with gravity control systems, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0017
rows.name: No use talking about it now, though.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0019
rows.name: You guys got too carried away![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10080100_MSG0020
rows.name:
Once you see this form,
you'll have no choice but to turn to cinders, yo!![ST:wait ]
